'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() ' called onBeforeAdd of "Program", "Project" ... If Me.getProperty("name","") = "" Then Return Me.getInnovator().newError("Program name is missing") End If
Dim folderTemplId As String = Me.getProperty("item_folder_template_id","")
Dim newFolder As Item = Me.newItem("Item Folder","add") newFolder.setProperty("name",Me.getProperty("name",""))
If folderTemplId <> "" Then 'set same folder template link on new top folder newFolder.setProperty("item_folder_template_id",folderTemplId) End If
newFolder = newFolder.apply() If newFolder.isError() Then Return newFolder
' link new folder to this item (Program, Project ...) Me.setProperty("top_item_folder_id",newFolder.GetID())
Return Me
